# Cyoda Platform

> Cyoda is a Scalable Event-Driven Architecture with Entity Database & AI Assistant.

- [Main Website](https://cyoda.com)
- [Documentation](https://docs.cyoda.net)

## Technical Deep Dives (Raw Markdown)

- [A Technical Description of the Cyoda Platform](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/A_Technical_Description_of_the_Cyoda_Platform.md)

- [Cyoda Platform Comparison Overview](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/cyoda_comparison_by_category.md)
- [The Future of Cyoda: Cloud-Native Entity Databases](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/the-future-of-cyoda-cloud.md)

### Core Concepts
- [What's an Entity Database?](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/Whats_an_Entity_Database.md)
- [Beyond Traditional Databases: Why Entity-Centric Architecture Matters](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/beyond-traditional-databases.md)
- [Entity Workflows for Event-Driven Architectures](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/Entity_Workflows_for_Event-Driven_Architectures.md)

### Architecture & Design
- [Event-Context Sharding vs. Traditional Sharding](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/event-context-sharding.md)

- [Asynchronous Workflow Automation: State Machines as First-Class Citizens](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/asynchronous-workflow-automation.md)

### Data & Querying
- [Querying the Past: Point-in-Time Data Access at Scale](https://cyoda.com/docs/blogs/querying-the-past.md)

### AI & Applications
